amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for participation of U.S. Armed Forces units in any operation in the territory of the former Yugoslavia above the level of forces so deployed as of the date of enactment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of August 3 as amendment No. 77, to prohibit the use of funds to increase the number of United States troops in the territory of the former Yugoslavia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neumann amendment (A018) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
